name: Frigibax
flavorText: Frigibax absorbs heat through its dorsal fin and converts the heat into ice energy. The higher the temperature, the more energy Frigibax stores.

previous.name: Iron Thorns
previous.flavorText: It has some similarities to a Pokémon introduced in a dubious magazine as a Tyranitar from one billion years into the future.

next.name: Arctibax
next.flavorText: Arctibax freezes the air around it, protecting its face with an ice mask and turning its dorsal fin into a blade of ice.

pokemon.name: Arctibax

pokemon.name: Baxcalibur
pokemon.flavorText: This Pokémon blasts cryogenic air out from its mouth. This air can instantly freeze even liquid-hot lava.
